Posts.Content:
Thank you for replying Alcie and Bev! 
I did get lorazepam for anxiety, Alcie. It helps when I can't sleep. : ) 
What is metastatic disease as apposed to mets, Bev? I sorta thought it was the same thing. And why do Drs track them if it might not mean anything?
Do the numbers themselves mean something or just the going up and/or down?
Also, I have realized that no matter what happens that Jesus is still with me and I don't have to fret over everything! 
So I'm trying to rest in Him and stay at peace, as much as possible. Some days are better than others.
(BTW.....I found out that I will have another grandchild born in Sept.....my oldest son's first child. I will then have 3 grandchildren and 2 step-grandchildren. That's exciting!)
Thanks!
Posts.Title: Does anyone know much about 27-29 ?

Posts.Content:
Thank you for all the info! I'll try to find my Dr reports and see the exact wording of the diagnosis. 
I know that I had some tumors in nodes and the wording of results, and others, on those led me to believe they expected that other cells had traveled but they were hiding or in remission. 
And ....even though I was first diagnosed in Feb or Mar 2005, I still go in for Dr checks every 6 months and this year for labs every 6-8 weeks. Now every 4 weeks.
You are right, I think I should go ahead with the scans.
Thank you again, Bev!
Posts.Title: Does anyone know much about 27-29 ?

Posts.Content:
I forgot to say that I am a 7 year survivor. My dx said most likely metastatic but nothing has ever been found. 
I was so so that I was cured and now THIS! 
 It is really throwing me for a loop and I'm so confused about
 how to feel. 
I don't want to go through chemo again....I don't know if I can do it...........
Posts.Title: Does anyone know much about 27-29 ?

Posts.Content: Wow! That had to be hard to hear all that! I don't think they should have said anything except that it looks suspicious and that you need a biopsy appt. All the other might be true but they can not be sure without a pathology report. I'm so sorry that they scared you like that! It seems unprofessional to me.
Posts.Title: Lesion found on mammogram

Posts.Content:
In July my 27-29 was 49......then up and up every 6 weeks.....now it is 73. 
They wanted to know if I wanted to start scans or just check again in 4 weeks. I said check again in 4 weeks and also wanted an appt for a screening mamo for the breast I have left. 
Should also just start the scans? 
I've been having anxiety attacks for months now. What am I supposed to do?
I'm eating myself crazy today!
Posts.Title: Does anyone know much about 27-29 ?

Posts.Content:
I found my DX! I guess it does actually say Metastatic.......
Invasive Lobular Carcinoma .....Metastatic left breast cancer.
3/05 -I had a left modified rad mastectomy and left axillary sentinel lymph node biopsy. 
Left breast:
Estrogen positive 3+ and progesterone positive 2+
Her-2 ACIS score 1.3
*Tumor mass of 5.0 x 5.0 x 1.5 cm showing extensive invasive lobular carcinoma in a background of extensive lobular carcinoma in-situ with numerous microcalcifications. Angiolymphatic space invasion is present.
*#1 Sentinel node 1.2 x 0.3 cm "positive for metastatic tumor"
Axillary contents - 5 of 10 lymph nodes metastatically involved; one lymph node 1.7cm, additional small lymph nodes, one additional larger lymph node
*Extrcapular extension by tumor is seen.
